fr.gouv.vitam.tools.mailextract.lib.core

Class MailBoxFolder

  • Object
    • fr.gouv.vitam.tools.mailextract.lib.core.MailBoxFolder
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JMMailBoxFolder, LPMailBoxFolder

    public abstract class MailBoxFolder
extends Object
    Abstract class for a mail box folder.

    It defines high-level methods for extracting and listing recursively folders using low-level methods from the non-abstract sub-classes, according to folder inner organisation. Each subclass has to be able to run through folders and to get messages.

    The descriptive metadata kept for a folder are:

    • folder name (Title metadata),
    • the minimum of all the SentDate of messages in this folder or in one of it's descendant, (StartDate metadata),
    • the maximum of all the SentDate of messages in this folder or in one of it's descendant, (EndDate metadata),
      • There's also a DescriptionLevel defined as RecordGrp.

      • getLogger

        public java.util.logging.Logger getLogger()
        Gets the logger created during the store extractor construction, and used in all mailextract classes.

        For convenience each class which may have some log actions has it's own getLogger method always returning the store extractor logger.

        Returns:
        logger

        public abstract String getFullName()

        Returns:

      • getFolderMessagesRawSize

        public long getFolderMessagesRawSize()
        Gets the folder messages raw size.

        The "raw" size is the sum of the size of messages in this specific folder, not in subfolders.

        Returns:
        the folder messages raw size

      • hasMessages

        public abstract boolean hasMessages()
                             throws ExtractionException
        Checks if this folder contains messages.
        Returns:
        true, if successful
        Throws:
        ExtractionException - Any unrecoverable extraction exception (access trouble, major format problems...)

        public abstract boolean hasSubfolders()

      • extractFolderAsRoot

        public void extractFolderAsRoot(boolean writeFlag)
                         throws ExtractionException
        Extract all messages and subfolders as extractFolder for the root folder.

        There's a special treatment of the Unit Node for root metadata, completion and writing being done by the store extractor. This folder is never dropped, .

        Throws:
        ExtractionException - Any unrecoverable extraction exception (access trouble, major format problems...)

      • extractFolder

        public boolean extractFolder(int level,
                             boolean writeFlag)
                      throws ExtractionException
        Extract all messages and subfolders.

        This is a method where the extraction structure and content is partially defined (see also extractMessage and extractAllFolders)

        It writes on the disk, recursively, all the messages and subfolders in this folder. For the detailed structure of extraction see class StoreExtractor.

        Parameters:
        level - distance from the root folder (used for drop options)
        Returns:
        true, if not empty
        Throws:
        ExtractionException - Any unrecoverable extraction exception (access trouble, major format problems...)

      • listFolder

        public void listFolder(boolean stats)
                throws ExtractionException
        List all folders with or without statistics.

        It lists on the console, one by line, the complete list of folders from the root folder defined in store extractor. If statistics are required, at the beginning of each line is added the number of messages directly in the folder and the raw size of theese messages.

        Parameters:
        stats - if true, add folder statistics
        Throws:
        ExtractionException - Any unrecoverable extraction exception (access trouble, major format problems...)
